dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.valueJoiner
dt-option.summary: Set the text between the value input elements where two are required

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.valueJoiner` changes what will be displayed between the two input elements, when a two part condition is selected (like between).

dt-option.description: This will set the text between the two value input elements, by default this is `'and'`. This language option is available in custom conditions and plugins also.
